data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Domahovski, Alexandre Cruz, Gonçalves, Clayton Corrêa, Takiya, Daniela Maeda, Cavichioli, Rodney Ramiro (2014): Seven new South American species of Regalana DeLong & Freytag (Cicadellidae: Iassinae: Gyponini). Zootaxa 3857 (2): 225-243, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3857.2.4
